@description.name: @description
@description.body: Module for querying information about the environment / runtime. It adds a static key env to qxWeb and offers the given methods. The following values are predefined: * browser.name : The name of the browser * browser.version : The version of the browser * browser.quirksmode : true if the browser is in quirksmode * browser.documentmode : The document mode of the browser * device.name : The name of the device e.g. iPad. * device.type : Either desktop, tablet or mobile. * engine.name : The name of the browser engine * engine.version : The version of the browser engine * event.touch : Checks if touch events are supported * event.mspointer : Checks if MSPointer events are available
